cmp: 夹 (clip/folder/hold between/to press from both sides/to place in between, hold between/lined/narrow lane)
mng: to clasp under the arm, to coerce

exm.mng: to carry along, to carry on one's person, to carry secretly
(expr.) hold the feudal overlord and you control his vassals
exm.pyn: xié tiān zǐ yǐ lìng zhū hóu

exm.mng: forced submission, to exploit advantage to force sb to do one's bidding
(expr.) hold the feudal overlord and you control the whole country
exm.pyn: xié tiān zǐ yǐ lìng tiān xià

exm.mng: gherao (from Hindi, SE Asian method of protest)
